= Implemented Features =

  * Playlist
  * Cover fetch
  * LastFM scrobbling
  * Media Library
  * Equalizer (GStreamer- and Xine backend on Phonon)
  * ID3 Tagger
  * Dynamic Playlists (using LastFM)
  * Pure Gstreamer without Phonon
  * Phonon optionally as plugin
  * Lyrics
  * LastFM radio
  * Custom playlists
  * Online Streams (e.g. Web-Radio)
